dmca.title: electronicebuys.com/Sony TV
dmca.body:
Please see below and act accordingly. 
 
Legal Response Team

________________________________

From: Jayme Williams [mailto:jayme@netenforcers.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, July 11, 2006 4:15 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: electronicebuys.com/Sony TV
Subject: electronicebuys.com/Sony TV



 

Hello Robert, 

I apologize if the referenced material hasn't been clearly stated. We
are intending to harrass you by any means, please understand this. We
are tyring to protect our Clients Intellectual Propety. I have provided
you each time with the links to the violations and have included that
they are the property of Sony Television. I have now included just the
pictures that are in copyright violation. The specific televisions are
that of Sony and we are not restricting the resell of these products,
but the copyright violations. I understand your frustration with this
issue. Hopefully now, with the PDF's attatched, you can clearly see the
images that are in violation. Please let me know if you need further
assistance. Thank-you. 

 

Jayme W

LMS Department Manager

Net Enforcers, Inc.

jayme@netenforcers.com <mailto:jayme@netenforcers.com> 

compliance.management@netenforcers.com
<mailto:compliance.management@netenforcers.com> 

The Online Enforcement Experts...... 
Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be
legally privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this
transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this
transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.

________________________________

From: Rodvid@aol.com [mailto:Rodvid@aol.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, July 11, 2006 4:48 PM
To: Jayme Williams
Subject: Re: electronicebuys.com Everything has been in compliance.

 

We have checked every single link  on this list and every picture is not
an exclusive sony picture.

We now believe at this point we are being harassed by your company, as
we have put much time into this complaint and yet you still refuse to
write me a release.

 

We persistently have asked your company to be explicit about what
exactly you are referring to yet you still  keep everything vague We
must have an answer soon.

Robert
